caption: Delegation Request
description: Request object for delegation operations including delegator, delegate, scope, constraints, and expiry.
name: delegation_request

delegator.caption: Delegator
delegator.description: The agent or organization identifier that is granting the delegation.

delegate.caption: Delegate
delegate.description: The agent or organization identifier receiving the delegation.

scope.caption: Scope
scope.description: The scope of permissions or actions being delegated.

constraints.caption: Constraints
constraints.description: Optional constraints or limitations on the delegation (e.g., time limits, resource limits).

expiry.caption: Expiry
expiry.description: Optional timestamp when the delegation expires.
